DOC.criteria: The subject enrol healthy volunteer , define follow : Healthy men woman 18 30 year old Nonsmokers Fit work Having give informed consent sign form Any serious disorder might interfere his/her participation study evaluation safety test drug ( e.g . renal insufficiency , hepatic dysfunction , cardiovascular disease , hypervitaminosis A , psychic disorder etc. ) . Treatment drug might interfere evaluation safety test drug Known hypersensitivity ingredient study drug Pregnancy , lactation , woman childbearing potential use establish contraceptive Drug alcohol abuse Participation another trial Known abnormal value laboratory test ( detected enrolment , subject continue treatment provide medical objection ) Specific dietary requirement allow volunteer meet dietary guideline set study
